item.title: 'This is no life': Security and long-held views shattered in south Lebanon amid Israeli strikes
item.description: A year on from a ceasefire in Lebanon, Israel is continuing attacks on what it says are Hezbollah's efforts to recover from their war.

item.title: US suspends immigration requests for Afghans after National Guard shooting
item.description: The alleged gunman in the Washington shooting is an Afghan national who entered the US in September 2021.

item.title: Two National Guard members in critical condition after shooting near White House
item.description: President Trump says the gunman behind the "act of terror" was an Afghan who entered the US in 2021.

item.title: Stone-hurling anger unnerves Zambia's 'fix-it' president
item.description: After 2021's landslide win, Hakainde Hichilema has nine months to convince voters he deserves a second term.

item.title: Georgia's pro-EU protesters defiant year after accession process was halted
item.description: The demonstrations began when Georgia's prime minister called a four-year halt on moves towards joining the EU.
